data.message:
It still trips me out how someone can say “Eminem, you show respect to the president regardless!” Who has the president shown respect? Was it to Puerto Rico by throwing paper towel like they won the lottery? Or was it telling Puerto Rico “We spent a lot of money on you, we need some return on our investment”?
No wait did he show respect to the Muslims gunned down by his supporter in that Canadian Mosque? Who exactly is he showing respect for other than hate groups and the NRA? Someone please tell me.

replies.message: Thank you.

Now, how about you post a comment about how Obama started to divide the country by using race and letting terrorist groups like the BLM get out of hand? How, while the BLM were killing Police, he was giving them a medal for being a "peaceful organization". It's funny. You Anti-Trumpers want to rag on Trump but won't say anything about Obama
It's funny you "trumpers" seem to like throwing insults at other people rather than address the completely true criticism given to your orange god. Funny how you guys like to re-direct so much.
Fuck Puerto Rico who cares if they all died it be awesome
Scummie piece of shit Albie. Your daughter is gonna grow up a fuckwit just like you except she'll be even less successful
Should he have thrown canned goods?  "Trump assaults crowd with food".
Joe Lydon he shouldnt throw anything, he should get his ass out there and hand the relief items to people with respect and empathy.
And there you have it, straight from the mouth of a trump supporter👌🏽....Albie Cremin

Jason Williams But the KKK we won't talk about or white supremacist........sure.........

Dusty Biester so where will that $5 trillion dollar surplus be going after he tweets us into a costly war? I care more about the soldiers that will pay with their lives than money that can be replaced.

If he said this about Obama,  it would be considered racists.  Im mixed race and weak liberals turning everything into race is a form of oppression.  Telling minorities that they are victims and that theres no way out except for democratic policies.  We have the highest minority success in this country since the 1776.  tired of liberal cry babies who can’t articulate a point of view

this all ya'll blancos de mierda another white thief stealin from our culture.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eKf50arUL7w
White liberals are dangerous and very racist!!!

What have any of the other presidents done for puerto Rico? Do some research sheep! Every President has bad faults and done shit nobody likes and em stayed quiet. Seems like all the hype about trump os for a reason.

You mean the regime that rules over N Korea which has been threatening the elimination of the US and Western society with nuclear weapons for a few decades now?  You asked for examples, I provided them, you continue to spout stupidity.  Ignore me, I won't follow your idiotic, fear-mongering narratives.
Alexandra Elizabeth Hoffman no Eminem didnt stay silent on any administration other than Obamas.
Gag

Ethan Henley wait a min, redirect....I will GIVE YOU SOME FACTS.....OBAMA CARE is a tax, nothing more, it has caused many to die , PEOPLE with cancer/disease.....Since it refuses US cancer patients with any care..........OBAMA was useless President who did divide this country on RACE I LIVE NEAR Detriot and we never had race issues until OBAMA and his racist wife.......I don't always like what TRUMP says, but I care what he does to better our lives....You people only care about PARTY......well  guess what I was a DEM.......FOR MANY YEARS, and left due to the lies, I don't like the GOP either...but I know TRUMP will better our lives he already has....OBAMA hasn't, he has attacked, me, and anyone like me.....Elderly, VETS, Health care, SSI, SSDI....every person who is weak...OBAMA attacked.......FACT i KNOW from experience, what about you??? I bet you get your info from CNN,.
Robert Redditt  i'M FROM Detriot, Marshall always thought he was black, he was cool back before he was famous, I knew him back then, but he turned into a liberal asshole...
